ygData.subject: Re: Clarity
ygData.msgSnippet: There is another place the error may have crept in.  You stated she was medding.  Since there is a chance med will fail (it is a skill after all) that would
ygData.messageBody:
There is another place the error may have crept in. You stated she was
medding. Since there is a chance med will fail (it is a skill after all)
that would skew the results. Best way to test would be to have the caster
sit, but not meditate, then time the results. This will give much cleaner
numbers.

Rokenn



>From: <kim@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Clarity
>Date: Sat, 4 Sep 1999 04:20:38 -0400 (EDT)
>
>From: <kim@...>
>
>I had a friend time how long it took her to med back one
>bubble:
>
>84 sec - normal
>62 sec - Clarity
>64 sec - Clarity + Hymn
>
>2 seconds is probably within the margin of error of eyballing
>"one bubble." We now have two timings saying you can weave
>Clarity without affecting its effectiveness, and only hearsay
>for not playing any other songs with Clarity.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
